Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is SWITZERLAND 1. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 24 CH1. These boxes were developed by a community of interest in order to preserve and promote old high-stemmed apple varieties. A box contains 6-9 varieties of apples (1 each), accompanied by info cards. The varieties are selected only from the Domleschg valley in Grisons.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is unspecified. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is unspecified. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current and Predicted. This VC is classified as Traditional and Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is Endogenous. developed by a community of interest in order to preserve old varieties, marketing old apple varieties as as high quality and also selling an experience (tasting). The innovation is related to New marketing strategies. The land use systems involved are Orchards. The local assets include Natural and cultural.
